duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high level executive and administrative support to management, including managing the broad strategic, policy, and agenda.
Direct daily correspondence and communication, and responsibly handle confidential and sensitive information.
Manage calendars, agendas, and quarterly business reviews for senior product department leaders.
Coordinate and manage key cross functional, and interdepartmental relationships.
Plan and arrange all department events, agendas, and meetings.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required. Bachelor’s Degree in relevant field required or in addition to minimum experience required, degree may be substituted with a combination of relevant education and/or work experience sufficient to perform the duties on a year-for-year basis. Professional certifications highly valued.
